vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Exile and Return, only mentioned at Neh.12.36;
son of: Jonathan (H3129K);
brother of: Zechariah (H2148Z), Shemaiah (H8098V), Azarel (H5832J), Milalai (H4450), Gilalai (H1562), Nethanel (H5417P), Judah (H3063K) and Hanani (H2607K)
§ Maai = "compassionate"
one of the sons of Asaph who took part in the musical service at the dedication of the wall of Jerusalem
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
瑪艾 这个陽性專有名詞在希伯來文的意思是 "慈悲的"
亞薩眾子之一。耶路撒冷城牆告成的時候，參與音樂的服事 (尼 12:36)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
玛艾 这个阳性专有名词在希伯来文的意思是 "慈悲的"
亚萨众子之一。耶路撒冷城墙告成的时候，参与音乐的服事 (尼 12:36)
